Class SortFilterModel<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.faces.model.DataModel<E>
      • view.SortFilterModel<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<E>

    public final class SortFilterModel<E>
extends javax.faces.model.DataModel<E>
implements java.io.Serializable
    Code adopted from Core Java Server Faces 3rd Edition, by David Geary and Cay Horstman Gives the ability of order a DataModel used in the JSF DataTable.
    See Also:
